price: Ka ce: "Bãbu wanda ya san gaibi a cikin sammai da ƙasa fãce Allah. Kuma bã su sansancẽwar a yaushe ne zã a tãyar da su."
arabic: قُل لَّا يَعۡلَمُ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yaʿlamu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi al-ghayba illā al-lahu wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
